meaningMnemonic: The <radical>sun</radical> is the reason why crops grow and people can get out of bed in the morning. But on planets with two <radical>sun</radical>s, they can get even more done and it makes them way more <kanji>prosperous</kanji> than us. They work all day, then as the first sun sets, the second one rises and they get a new burst of energy. The whole planet lives in a state of <kanji>prosperity</kanji> because of the two suns.
readingMnemonic: The person on this planet with two suns who benefits from the prosperity the most is the <reading>Shou</reading>gun (しょう). Yes, this planet still has a shougun as their leader, but everything is going so well that they didn't see a need to change. The shogun will be in charge of this prosperous world forever. No one ever thinks of revolt when everyone has everything they could ever need.
